comments.body:
What happens if this playbook is run twice, ie if `laurentn-vsim1` doesn't exist on the 2nd run?

Code needs to deal wit that and the documentation needs to explain it
The code does deal with it, it returns no change because it sees that the new node name already exists and the old doesn't.  What explanation in the documentation are you looking for?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +40,44 @@    username: "{{ netapp_username }}"
    password: "{{ netapp_password }}"
    from_name: laurentn-vsim1
    name: laurentncluster-2
"""
